job.title: Data Scientist- Strategy & Analytics
job.description: pAbout the TeamppTikTok is the leading destination for shortform mobile video Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy ppOur US Safety team provides key support for TikToks innovative initiatives stateoftheart products and integrated platforms servicing our US market As a Data Scientist on TikToks US Safety team you will be instrumental in ensuring that TikTok remains a safe trustworthy and riskfree environment to create and enjoy content across all of our apps while protecting our brand The ideal candidate will have a background in a technical field will have experience working with large data sets and will have some experience delivering data products on a fastpaced team This position will be fulltime and will be based in our Los Angeles CA locationppbrppResponsibilitiespp Partner with product operations policy and engineering teams to scope design execute measure and improve the impact of US Safety effortspp Conduct quantitative analysis deliver insights and influence US Safety decision making through understanding of user behavior and safety ecosystempp Design and monitor core metrics perform root cause analysis to explain driverspp Identify trends and opportunities to drive safety initiatives and create a healthy ecosystem for content creators users and consumerspp Design and analyze experiments to inform and influence safety investmentspp Acquire new data from various production systems and databasesppQualificationsppQualificationspp 1 years of experience in data science data analytics product analytics or quantitative analysispp Experience in utilizing SQLPython to extract manipulate and analyze datasetspp Experience with creating data visualizations to communicate metric performancepp Experience with statistical analysis or data modeling techniques including hypothesis testing model evaluation and common regression and classification algorithmspp Experience building data infrastructure and implementing reporting solutionsppbrppPreferred qualifications pp Previous experience in data science data analytics or product analytics at a consumer technology companypp Passion for social technology products and a curiosity to learnampgrow with a fast paced companypp Experience working with international partners in different time zonesppbrppbrppEEODampI StatementpulliTikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills experiences and unique perspectives Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace At TikTok our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy To achieve that goal we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach We believe individuals shouldnt be disadvantaged because of their background or identity but instead should be considered based on their strengths and experience We are passionate about this and hope you are tooliul
